product_name: Moving Comfort Urban Gym Sweatshirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With an off-the-shoulder style and a hint of shimmer in the fabric, the Moving Comfort Urban Gym Sweatshirt is designed to keep you comfortable during workouts and cozy if you're just hanging around. Heathered fabric features a warm, brushed interior to boost comfort; metallic fibers add sparkle to create a shimmering effect. The Moving Comfort Urban Gym Sweatshirt offers a relaxed fit. Rib-knit cuffs and hem; raw-edge seams; Dolman-inspired fit; machine wash cold and hang to dry. Closeout.
short_description: With an off-the-shoulder style and a hint of shimmer in the fabric, the Moving Comfort Urban Gym Sweatshirt is designed to keep you comfortable during workouts and cozy if you're just hanging around.
